text:
4smarts to Officially Enter the European Market
4smarts, a Hong Kong-based manufacturer of consumer electronics, announces its entrance on the European market through its subsidiary in Bavaria, Germany.
Augsburg, Germany, August 31, 2015 --( PR.com )-- 4smarts Hong Kong, a developer and manufacturer of mobile phone accessories announces its official entrance on the European market through its subsidiary in Germany at the IFA 2015 in Berlin, between 4 and 9 September. Starting with September 2015, the core 4smarts’ products will be available.
4smarts product range is comprised of smartphone accessories for protection, cleaning, charging, connecting, fixing, mounting and playing, from protective screens and selfie sticks to wireless chargers and virtual reality glasses. The novelty that 4smarts brings to the European market is the possibility to order unlimited amounts of products directly from stock. Nonetheless, the company offers various types of customizable OEM/ODM programs and retail packaging solutions.
“We create smartphone accessories inspired by everyday life and we plan to deliver them to as many end users as possible with the help of our partners and distributors throughout Europe. Our value proposition is simple, yet unique on the European market: premium quality at very affordable prices. In fact, we are so sure of the products’ quality that we offer our partners the possibility of stock rotation. We pair this with great flexibility on each new partner deal and immediate stock availability in order to help all our clients maximize their profits,” says Simon Rouhany, CEO of the 4smarts European headquarters based in Germany.
“We spent over a decade as OEM suppliers for large consumer electronic brands. It took us a lot to perfect the techniques we now use for our own brand, but we are very proud of what we have managed to achieve over the years – getting the MFi Apple certification, as well as other milestone achievements. The 4smarts products are fit for any smartphone and the R&D department keeps up with any new phone launch; thus, the company can cater to every need of a smartphone user, irrespective of the model of choice. The company ships from the very heart of Europe, in southern Germany, so that all partners can receive the products within days of their order. Furthermore, all the products are already tested and certified for Europe and the Americas,” says Neo Wang, 4smarts production plant CEO and Co-Founder of the 4smarts group Hong Kong.
About 4smarts
Headquartered in Hong Kong, the 4smarts group is a certified manufacturer of smartphone accessories, with more than 15 years of experience in the field. The wide range of products contains both premium and entry-level accessories, so that all 4smarts partners can cover as many market segments as possible. With new products being released on a monthly basis, the company aims to be one step ahead of fashion and technology trends and help improve the lifestyle of the users of its accessories.
4smarts sells its products through a carefully built network of partners and distributors in Europe and the Americas. This network is continuously expanding in new countries.
